verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> the Lord!<WH3050> How blessed<WH835> is the man<WH376> who fears<WH3372> the Lord,<WH3068> Who greatly<WH3966> delights<WH2654> in His commandments.<WH4687>
His descendants<WH2233> will be mighty<WH1368> on earth;<WH776> The generation<WH1755> of the upright<WH3477> will be blessed.<WH1288>
Wealth<WH1952> and riches<WH6239> are in his house,<WH1004> And his righteousness<WH6666> endures<WH5975> forever.<WH5703>
Light<WH216> arises<WH2224> in the darkness<WH2822> for the upright;<WH3477> [He is] gracious<WH2587> and compassionate<WH7349> and righteous.<WH6662>
It is well<WH2896> with the man<WH376> who is gracious<WH2603> and lends;<WH9233> He will maintain<WH3557> his cause<WH1697> in judgment.<WH4941>
For he will never<WH5769> <WH3808> be shaken;<WH4131> The righteous<WH6662> will be remembered<WH2143> forever.<WH5769>
He will not fear<WH3372> evil<WH7451> tidings;<WH8052> His heart<WH3820> is steadfast,<WH3559> trusting<WH982> in the Lord.<WH3068>
His heart<WH3820> is upheld,<WH5564> he will not fear,<WH3372> Until<WH5704> he looks<WH7200> [with satisfaction] on his adversaries.<WH6862>
He has given<WH5414> freely<WH6340> to the poor;<WH34> His righteousness<WH6666> endures<WH5975> forever;<WH5703> His horn<WH7161> will be exalted<WH7311> in honor.<WH9202>
The wicked<WH7563> will see<WH7200> it and be vexed;<WH3707> He will gnash<WH2786> his teeth<WH8127> and melt<WH4549> away;<WH4549> The desire<WH8378> of the wicked<WH7563> will perish.
